QuestData.Title: Turn Around, Nighteyes
QuestData.Description: Stranger, you must help me!$b$bNighteyes, my old friend... he was scouting ahead and I heard him cry out a warning. I tried to run after him, but in my carelessness I stepped in this trap.$b$bHe's so close, just on the other side of this ridge. Please find him!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r. I will tend to Nighteyes' wounds. Tell me what happened!
